trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Remove-ItemProperty
trans-unit.target: Remove-itemproperty

trans-unit.source: Remove-ItemProperty
trans-unit.target: Remove-itemproperty

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Deletes the property and its value from an item.
trans-unit.target: 刪除項目的屬性及其值。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: Path (Default)
trans-unit.target: 路徑 （預設值）

trans-unit.source: LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: 常值路徑

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The **Remove-ItemProperty** cmdlet deletes a property and its value from an item.
trans-unit.target: **Remove-itemproperty** cmdlet 會從項目刪除屬性和它的值。

trans-unit.source: You can use it to delete registry values and the data that they store.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用它來刪除登錄值和它們所儲存的資料。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Delete a registry value
trans-unit.target: 範例 1︰ 刪除登錄值

trans-unit.source: This command deletes the SmpProperty registry value, and its data, from the SmpApplication subkey of the HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software registry key.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會從 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software 登錄機碼的 SmpApplication 子機碼中刪除 SmpProperty 登錄值及其資料。

trans-unit.source: Because the command is issued from a file system drive (PS C:\\\>), it includes the fully qualified path of the SmpApplication subkey, including the drive, HKLM:, and the Software key.
trans-unit.target: 因為發出此命令從檔案系統磁碟機 (PS\\\>)，其中包括完整的路徑的 SmpApplication 子機碼，包括磁碟機、 HKLM:，以及軟體機碼。

trans-unit.source: It uses the *Name* parameter to identify the registry value that is being deleted.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用 *名稱* 參數來識別要刪除的登錄值。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Delete a registry value from the HKCU location
trans-unit.target: 範例 2︰ 從 HKCU 的位置刪除登錄值

trans-unit.source: These commands delete the Options registry value, and its data, from the MyApp subkey of HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\MyCompany.
trans-unit.target: 這些命令會從 HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\MyCompany 的 MyApp 子機碼刪除 Options 登錄值及其資料。

trans-unit.source: The first command uses the Set-Location cmdlet to change the current location to the HKEY_CURRENT_USER drive (HKCU:) and the Software\MyCompany\MyApp subkey.
trans-unit.target: 第一個命令使用 Set-Location Cmdlet，將目前的位置變更為 HKEY_CURRENT_USER 磁碟機 (HKCU:) 和 Software\MyCompany\MyApp 子機碼。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses **Remove-ItemProperty** to remove the Options registry value, and its data, from the MyApp subkey.
trans-unit.target: 第二個命令會使用 **Remove-itemproperty** 移除 Options 登錄值和其資料，從 MyApp 子機碼。

trans-unit.source: Because *Path* is required, the command uses a dot (.) to indicate the current location.
trans-unit.target: 因為 *路徑* 是必要，此命令會使用點 （.） 來指示目前的位置。

trans-unit.source: It uses *Name* to specify which registry value to delete.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用 *名稱* 來指定要刪除的登錄值。

trans-unit.source: It uses the *Confirm* parameter to request a user prompt before deleting the value.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用 *確認* 之前刪除值，要求使用者提示的參數。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Remove a registry value by using the pipeline
trans-unit.target: 範例 3︰ 使用管線移除登錄值

trans-unit.source: This command deletes the NoOfEmployees registry value, and its data, from the HKLM\Software\MyCompany registry key.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會從 HKLM\Software\MyCompany 登錄機碼刪除 NoOfEmployees 登錄值及其資料。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the Get-Item cmdlet to get an item that represents the registry key.
trans-unit.target: 命令使用 Get-Item Cmdlet 取得代表登錄機碼的項目。

trans-unit.source: It uses a pipeline operator (|) to send the object to **Remove-ItemProperty**.
trans-unit.target: 它使用管線運算子 (|) 將物件傳送至 **Remove-itemproperty**。

trans-unit.source: Then, it uses the *Name* parameter of **Remove-ItemProperty** to specify the name of the registry value.
trans-unit.target: 然後，它會使用 *名稱* 參數 **Remove-itemproperty** 指定登錄值的名稱。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -Confirm
trans-unit.target: -Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。

trans-unit.source: -Credential
trans-unit.target: -Credential

trans-unit.source: Specifies a user account that has permission to perform this action.
trans-unit.target: 指定具有執行此動作權限的使用者帳戶。

trans-unit.source: The default is the current user.
trans-unit.target: 預設為目前使用者。

trans-unit.source: Type a user name, such as User01 or Domain01\User01, or enter a **PSCredential** object, such as one generated by the Get-Credential cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 輸入使用者名稱，例如 User01 或 Domain01\User01，或輸入 **PSCredential** 物件，例如 Get-credential cmdlet 產生的物件。

trans-unit.source: If you type a user name, this cmdlet prompts you for a password.
trans-unit.target: 如果您輸入使用者名稱，這個指令程式會提示您輸入密碼。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not supported by any providers installed with Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 與 Windows PowerShell 一起安裝的任何提供者皆不支援此參數。

trans-unit.source: -Exclude
trans-unit.target: -排除

trans-unit.source: Specifies items that this cmdlet omits.
trans-unit.target: 指定此 cmdlet 會省略的項目。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the *Path* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此參數的值會限定 *路徑* 參數。

trans-unit.source: Enter a path element or pattern, such as *.txt.
trans-unit.target: 輸入路徑元素或模式，例如 *.txt。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard characters are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: -Filter
trans-unit.target: 篩選器

trans-unit.source: Specifies a filter in the format or language of the provider.
trans-unit.target: 指定篩選條件格式或語言提供者。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the *Path* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此參數的值會限定 *路徑* 參數。

trans-unit.source: The syntax of the filter, including the use of wildcard characters, depends on the provider.
trans-unit.target: 篩選條件，包括萬用字元，使用的語法取決於提供者。

trans-unit.source: Filters are more efficient than other parameters, because the provider applies them when it retrieves the objects instead of having Windows PowerShell filter the objects after they are retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 篩選條件會比其他參數更有效率，因為提供者擷取的物件，而不需篩選的物件之後擷取的 Windows PowerShell 時將其套用。

trans-unit.source: -Force
trans-unit.target: -Force

trans-unit.source: Forces the cmdlet to remove a property of an object that cannot otherwise be accessed by the user.
trans-unit.target: 強制 cmdlet 移除無法由使用者存取物件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Implementation varies from provider to provider.
trans-unit.target: 實作會依提供者而異。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Providers.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Providers。

trans-unit.source: -Include
trans-unit.target: -Include

trans-unit.source: Specifies items to delete.
trans-unit.target: 指定要刪除的項目。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the *Path* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此參數的值會限定 *路徑* 參數。

trans-unit.source: Enter a path element or pattern, such as *.txt.
trans-unit.target: 輸入路徑元素或模式，例如 *.txt。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard characters are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: -LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: -LiteralPath

trans-unit.source: Specifies a path of the item property.
trans-unit.target: 指定的項目屬性的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The value of the *LiteralPath* parameter is used exactly as it is typed.
trans-unit.target: 值 *LiteralPath* 完全依照其輸入，使用參數。

trans-unit.source: No characters are interpreted as wildcard characters.
trans-unit.target: 沒有字元會被視為萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: If the path includes escape characters, enclose it in single quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 如果路徑包含逸出字元，請將它括在單引號中。

trans-unit.source: Single quotation marks tell Windows PowerShell not to interpret any characters as escape sequences.
trans-unit.target: 單引號告知 Windows PowerShell 不要將任何字元視為逸出序列。

trans-unit.source: -Name
trans-unit.target: -Name

trans-unit.source: Specifies the names of the properties to remove.
trans-unit.target: 指定要移除之屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: -Path
trans-unit.target: -Path

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path of the item whose properties are being removed.
trans-unit.target: 指定要移除其屬性的項目路徑。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard characters are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: -UseTransaction
trans-unit.target: -UseTransaction

trans-unit.source: Includes the command in the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 將命令加入使用中交易。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when a transaction is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 只有交易為處理中狀態時，此參數才有效。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Includes the command in the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱包含使用中交易中的命令。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when a transaction is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 只有交易為處理中狀態時，此參數才有效。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱本主題中的

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf
trans-unit.target: -WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 顯示執行 Cmdlet 後會發生的情況。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 無法執行此指令程式。顯示執行此指令程式會發生什麼事。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.
trans-unit.target: 未執行 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: System.String
trans-unit.target: System.String

trans-unit.source: You can pipe a string that contains a path, but not a literal path, to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過管道傳送包含路徑，但不是常值路徑，此指令程式的字串。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not return any output.
trans-unit.target: 此 Cmdlet 不會傳回任何輸出。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: You can also refer to **Remove-ItemProperty** by its built-in alias, **rp**.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以參考 **Remove-itemproperty** 內建的別名， **rp**。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Aliases.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Aliases。

trans-unit.source: In the Windows PowerShell Registry provider, registry values are considered to be properties of a registry key or subkey.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell 登錄提供者中，登錄值會被視為登錄機碼或子機碼的屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can use the **ItemProperty** cmdlets to manage these values.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 **ItemProperty** 指令程式來管理這些值。

trans-unit.source: **Remove-ItemProperty** is designed to work with the data exposed by any provider.
trans-unit.target: **Remove-itemproperty** 設計來搭配任何提供者所公開的資料。

trans-unit.source: To list the providers available in your session, type `Get-PSProvider`.
trans-unit.target: 若要列出您的工作階段中可用的提供者，請輸入 `Get-PSProvider`。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Providers.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Providers。
